title: Error 505: Something has gone hextechnically wrong.
body: This is my first time on PBE access and I went on to go and sign up for an account but I got the same error that everyone else is having please somebody help and/or riot please help.

replies.body: Not sure if i trust it targon is there any other option
I have the same problem here
I have also this problem (505 error){{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

I can confirm the page is still loading up on my side. Can you try using a VPN such as [Hotspot Shield](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [Cyberghost](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/) to see if it resolves this.

Let me know if this helped.
